alert.note: Alert for Lake of the Woods; Roseau (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 10 at 9:51AM CDT until July 10 at 10:15AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN POLK...SOUTHEASTERN ROSEAU...BELTRAMI...SOUTHWESTERN LAKE OF THE WOODS AND NORTHERN CLEARWATER COUNTIES... At 951 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Roosevelt to Upper Red Lake to near Debs, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fosston, Redby, Clearbrook, Red Lake, Lower Red Lake, Ponemah and Gonvick. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
